dcterms:creator: I. Mel'čuk
A. Polguere
dcterms:description: A theoretical framework for explanatory and combinatorial lexicology, providing insights into the structure and function of lexical resources.
dcterms:title: Introduction à la lexicologie explicative et combinatoire

dcterms:creator: I. Mel'čuk
dcterms:description: Discussion on collocations in dictionaries and cultural gaps in bilingual dictionaries, focusing on lexical relationships.
dcterms:title: Collocations dans le dictionnaire, Les écarts culturels dans les Dictionnaires bilingues

dcterms:creator: P. Saint-Dizier
dcterms:description: Methodological challenges and elements for constructing semantic lexical resources, emphasizing the importance of quality in lexical resources.
dcterms:title: Quelques défis et éléments de méthode pour la construction de ressources lexicales sémantiques

dcterms:creator: A. Strigin
dcterms:description: Exploration of lexical rules as generators of hypotheses, contributing to the understanding of semantic relationships in language.
dcterms:title: Lexical Rules as Hypothesis Generators
